description:
This course is going to save you time and money by teaching you how to do your own hair properly. No more $50 per blow-out because I am going to show you the techniques and required preparation for a professional look lasting up to three days.

  • 9 lectures (mostly video)
  • 1 hour of video
  • Well-curated resources for the best tools at a variety of price points.
  • An expert mindset to show you nuanced tricks and tips that explain why you've been so far unable to make your hair look awesome.

My approach starts with good washing technique. Then I show you how to prepare your hair for efficient styling. Then we get down and dirty with a rough dry approach followed up by a more strategic, silky and focused dry. That's the money shot.

Then, so that I earn my keep, I will show you how to style that same head of hair on day 2 and 3 without washing. And yes, we talk about how to make it work when you work-out.

This is a course that pays for itself in skill and money in less than 72 hours.

You are welcome.

See you soon!
title: Do You Own Hair: Sleek & Straight Blow-Out in 30 minutes.
